Name: Fall Balance Ball
About the game: Balance on platforms, jump and pass barriers. Set records! Fight your best time! Collected crystals will give you super powers. Features A lot of levels with increasing difficulty and various obstacles. There are 7 super abilities in the game: Slowing Time, Strengthening, Dash Forward, Powerful Jump, Teleportation, Double Jump, Building of auxiliary platforms. The game has a world leaderboard. Compete for the best time. The second game mode for the first chapter, which complicates the passage. The introductory rule is to collect all the crystals to complete the level. Chapter 1: Increasing difficulty levels. Chapter 2: Reach the portal to go to the next level. Only the powers of crystals will help you solve puzzles and overcome barriers.
